thread.title: 21 Times B.C. Burst With 'True North Strong And Free'
thread.title_full: 21 Times B.C. Burst With 'True North Strong And Free'

author: Rhianna Schmunk
title: 21 Times B.C. Burst With 'True North Strong And Free'
text:
21 Times B.C. Burst With 'True North Strong And Free' The Huffington Post B.C. | By Rhianna Schmunk reddit 
On July 1, we Canadians find ourselves especially proud to live where we do. In B.C., we're feeling extra appreciative of our province and its untamed mountain ranges, sapphire-blue lakes, and roaring coastline. 
We've rounded up some of your photos shared with us on Instagram (hash-tagged #huffpostbc) that really capture the gorgeous wilderness of the West Coast. 
Without further ado, here are 21 photos that prove B.C. embodies true north strong and free . A photo posted by Kate Zessel (@katezessel) on Jun 24, 2015 at 10:45pm PDT A photo posted by Alex Barrera (@arch_barrera) on Jun 18, 2015 at 11:54pm PDT A photo posted by Jeremy Koreski (@jeremykoreski) on Jan 31, 2015 at 1:48pm PST A photo posted by Rockieschick's Adventures (@rockieschick22) on Feb 10, 2015 at 9:06am PST A photo posted by Bradley Friesen (@bradleyfriesen) on Mar 3, 2015 at 4:48pm PST A photo posted by Michael Bain (@theplaidshirt) on Jun 18, 2015 at 2:19pm PDT A photo posted by kimm (@talltreescoldseas) on Jun 6, 2015 at 12:45am PDT A photo posted by Kyler Vos (@kylervos) on May 8, 2015 at 10:07am PDT A photo posted by Alex Barrera (@arch_barrera) on Jun 20, 2015 at 9:51pm PDT A photo posted by Jeremy Koreski (@jeremykoreski) on Jul 10, 2014 at 7:03am PDT A photo posted by Tage Stenner (@tagestenner) on Jun 1, 2015 at 6:32pm PDT A photo posted by Tamara R (@t2rae) on Jun 13, 2015 at 8:59am PDT A photo posted by Josie Baik 백승민 (@baiktobasics) on May 6, 2015 at 1:32pm PDT A photo posted by Local Wanderer (@localwanderer) on Dec 10, 2014 at 7:13pm PST A photo posted by Nhi Le (@noyocreative) on Jun 25, 2015 at 8:43pm PDT A photo posted by •British Columbian• (@westcoastroamer) on Feb 13, 2015 at 7:49pm PST A photo posted by Nhi Le (@noyocreative) on Mar 21, 2015 at 9:00pm PDT A photo posted by Katrina (@ktreehawkins) on Jun 16, 2015 at 11:20pm PDT A photo posted by Rockieschick's Adventures (@rockieschick22) on Jun 22, 2015 at 10:19pm PDT A photo posted by Jeremy Koreski (@jeremykoreski) on May 27, 2015 at 10:02am PDT
